schools and groups (mostly from Northumberland County)

This is a collection of school and other group photos from around our area. If our relatives aren't in particular ones, friends are sure to be. We want to thank everyone who contributed these to our archive and, especially, those who made sure that every name was on the back of some photos. If you can supply missing names (or further photos) please let us know. You can get a closer view by clicking on the thumbnail picture.
